properties.name: icon
properties.description: The icon to show on this tab (optional)
properties.rawdescription: The icon to show on this tab (optional)

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label to show for that tab.
properties.rawdescription: The label to show for that tab.

properties.name: onSelect
properties.description: Event emitter to handle the selection of the tab.
properties.rawdescription: Event emitter to handle the selection of the tab.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The angular route path to navigate to on click.
properties.rawdescription: The angular route path to navigate to on click.

properties.name: template
properties.description: Additional template to replace the label (note the label will still be used as title and on mobile devices)
properties.rawdescription: Additional template to replace the label (note the label will still be used as title and on mobile devices)
